message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  While $900,000 is a strong offer, I'm aiming for a slightly higher price point. Would you consider $1,050,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,050,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $950,000. Can we meet at this price?
